nodes.id: 中国共产党常宁市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市委员会
中国共产党常宁县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省衡阳市常宁市的领导机关，前身是中国共产党常宁县委员会。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Changning, Hengyang, Hunan Province. Its predecessor was the Changning County Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Constitution of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本法规，规定了党的纲领、组织原则和纪律。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China, which stipulate the party's program, organizational principles, and discipline.

nodes.id: 中国共产党常宁市代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市代表大会
en: Changning Municipal Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市委员会的上级机构。
description.en: The superior body of the Changning Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党常宁市委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市委员会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Changning Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The standing body of the Changning Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党常宁市纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市纪律检查委员会
en: Changning Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 负责监督和执行中国共产党纪律的常宁市级机构。
description.en: The Changning municipal body responsible for supervising and enforcing the discipline of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 常宁市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Changning City.

description.zh-cn: 一个为在中国南方地区建立新政权而组织的工作团队，陈茂艺是其成员之一。
description.en: A working group organized to establish new political power in southern China, of which Chen Maoyi was a member.

description.zh-cn: 指在中华人民共和国成立前后，从北方南下到南方地区工作的中国共产党干部群体。
description.en: Refers to the group of cadres of the Communist Party of China who moved from the north to work in the southern regions around the time of the founding of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，首任中共常宁县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, the first Party Secretary of Changning County Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共常宁市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, formerly served as the Party Secretary of Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共常宁市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, formerly served as the Party Secretary of Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共常宁市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, formerly served as the Party Secretary of Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共常宁市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.source: 中国共产党常宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市委员会是中国共产党设在常宁市的地方组织。
description.en: The Changning Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China is the local organization of the CPC established in Changning City.

relationships.target: 中国共产党常宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 《中国共产党章程》是中国共产党常宁市委员会的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the Communist Party of China serves as the legal basis authorizing the Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.source: 中国共产党常宁市委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党常宁市代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市代表大会是中国共产党常宁市委员会的上级机构。
description.en: The Changning Municipal Congress of the Communist Party of China is the superior body to the Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.source: 中国共产党常宁市委员会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党常宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市委员会常务委员会是中国共产党常宁市委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC is the permanent body of the Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.source: 中国共产党常宁市纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党常宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市纪律检查委员会是中国共产党常宁市委员会的本级纪律检查机关。
description.en: The Changning Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection is the discipline inspection body at the same level as the Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.source: 中国共产党常宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党常宁市委员会是常宁市的领导机关，对常宁市人民政府的工作进行领导。
description.en: The Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC is the leading organ in Changning and directs the work of the People's Government of Changning City.

description.zh-cn: 陈茂艺是晋中南下工作团的成员。
description.en: Chen Maoyi was a member of the Jinzhong Southward Working Group.

description.zh-cn: 陈茂艺是一名南下干部。
description.en: Chen Maoyi was a Southbound Cadre.

relationships.target: 中国共产党常宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈茂艺是首任中共常宁县委书记。
description.en: Chen Maoyi was the first Party Secretary of the Changning County Committee of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党常宁市委员会
中国共产党常宁市委员会
中国共产党常宁市委员会
中国共产党常宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2021年5月，吴乐胜接替刘达祥出任中共常宁市委书记。
description.en: In May 2021, Wu Lesheng succeeded Liu Daxiang as the Party Secretary of the Changning Municipal Committee of the CPC.
